column4: Hey guys!, Cant get outside world to see my apache server!! i forwarded port 80 in virginmedia Superhub, what should i do now??? any sugestions
How are you testing if the outside can see your server?

If its from inside the local network, some routers don't let connect using the external web address, may be worth using http://www.downforeveryoneorjustme.com/ to see if that can see the website just to rule that out
